data.comment: Today's referee, Oscar Mejia Garcia, has blown to start the match.
In Monterrey Monterrey's Ake Arnaud Loba is caught offside.
In the minute 2, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Nicolas Vikonis for Puebla who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Penalty! Oscar Mejia Garcia points to the spot, great chance for Monterrey...
In the minute 5, Nicolas Vikonis is back on the pitch.
Goal! Nicolas Sanchez gives Monterrey the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 1-0.
Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
Throw-in for Monterrey in the half of Puebla.
In the minute 15, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
Puebla needs to be cautious. Monterrey have an attacking throw-in.
Monterrey to take a throw-in in Puebla territory.
In the minute 18, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Puebla.
Rogelio Funes Mori (Monterrey) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Nicolas Sanchez for Monterrey gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 20, Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Puebla a goal kick.
Free kick Monterrey.
In Monterrey Monterrey drive forward through Maximiliano Meza. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 23, Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
Corner awarded to Puebla.
Throw-in for Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 25, Throw-in high up the field for Puebla in Monterrey.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Puebla's Christian Tabo has run offside.
In the minute 29, Puebla have a goal kick.
Monterrey awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
In the minute 34, It's a goal kick for the home team in Monterrey.
Goal! Ake Arnaud Loba extends Monterrey's lead to 2-0.
Monterrey's Rogelio Funes Mori breaks free at Estadio BBVA Bancomer. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 36, Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Puebla a goal kick.
In Monterrey Monterrey attack through Rogelio Funes Mori. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
In the minute 42, Play has been interrupted briefly in Monterrey to check on Ake Arnaud Loba, who is grimacing with pain.
Antonio Mohamed (Monterrey) has taken off Ake Arnaud Loba who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Aviles Hurtado is the replacement.
Puebla have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Monterrey.
Puebla have a dangerous throw-in.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Can Puebla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monterrey's half?
Juan Reynoso is making the team's first substitution at Estadio BBVA Bancomer with Nestor Vicente Vidrio replacing Omar Fernandez.
The away team have replaced Amaury Escoto with Santiago Ormeno. This is the second substitution made today by Juan Reynoso.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Monterrey.
Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 49, Goal! Monterrey extend their lead to 3-0 through Rogelio Funes Mori.
Rogelio Funes Mori of Monterrey is pulled up for offside.
In Monterrey a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 53, Corner awarded to Monterrey.
Oscar Mejia Garcia blows against Puebla's Osvaldo Martinez for offside.
Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 56, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a throw-in for Puebla, close to Monterrey's area.
Puebla drives forward and Santiago Ormeno gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Monterrey's Rogelio Funes Mori is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 57, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
In the minute 58, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Puebla throw-in in Monterrey's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Monterrey.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Puebla in the half of Monterrey.
Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Puebla.
In the minute 64, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Arturo Gonzalez.
Sebastian Vegas is replacing Jesus Gallardo for Monterrey at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
Antonio Mohamed (Monterrey) is making a second substitution, with Vincent Janssen replacing Rogelio Funes Mori.
In the minute 65, Arturo Gonzalez (Monterrey) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Celso Ortiz.
Puebla have been given a penalty...
Puebla are back in the match in Monterrey. A Santiago Ormeno penalty has made the score 3-1.
In the minute 70, Goal kick for Monterrey at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
Corner awarded to Monterrey.
Puebla have a goal kick.
In the minute 74, Ball safe as Puebla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
Free kick for Monterrey in the half of Puebla.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
Throw-in for Monterrey at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
Puebla make their third substitution with Bernardo Cuesta replacing George Corral.
In the minute 80, Puebla have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Can Puebla capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Daniel Arreola (Puebla) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 82, Important block from the Monterrey defence as Osvaldo Martinez fires in a strike for Puebla.
The match at Estadio BBVA Bancomer has been interrupted briefly for a check on Vincent Janssen, who is down injured.
Vincent Janssen returns to the field for Monterrey after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 84, Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Puebla a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Puebla.
The away team have replaced Pablo Gonzalez Diaz with Eduardo Herrera. This is the fourth substitution made today by Juan Reynoso.
In the minute 87, Edson Gutierrez (Monterrey) gets a yellow card.
Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Corner awarded to Puebla.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Monterrey close to the penalty box.
Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
That's full-time at Estadio BBVA Bancomer. The final score is 3-1.
The home team replace Edson Gutierrez with Daniel Alexis Parra.
